mthong ba che// thabs kyi thabs te dngos grub rmad// shin tu ngo mtshar rdzogs chen po// sangs rgyas thugs la mi mnga' ba// 'di rtog go ba brgya nang na// gcig mi 'ong bar shin tu grags// lung du bsgom bsgrub
kun dang bral// khyab pas bde chen don zhes bya// mthong med bsam pas thams cad mthong// de ni nges bsgom mchog chen po// sa dang pha rol phyin las 'das// de yi snang ba rang bzhin med// rang bzhin

med pa mi bsam ste// smra bsam yul las 'das pa'o// sems kyi 'byung tshor byung ba na// de ka rang bzhin rang zhi ba// nges don snying po bla na med// rnam rtog bsags pa'i phra rgyas kyis// log khrig don min
brtas pa'i mthu// bzlog dka' gnyen pos bzlog pa min// rgyal las dmangs byung tha mar rgyal// rgyal po thu bo mi yi mchog/ rgyal bzung rgyal khams cham la phab// nges par bsad pas sdig mi 'ong// 'di
ni slar 'tsho shin tu rgyal// mkhas pas rgyal po bsad gyur na// shin tu rgyal 'khor bzang bar 'ong// lug bzlog bde chen sa la 'das// byang chub sems bsgom pa las mthong ba bltar med pa'i
skabs//// de nas chos nyid ji bzhin pa'i don bka' stsal pa/ sems mi g.yo ba sangs rgyas so// gang yang ma bskyed don de la// gang gnas chos nyid yin par bshad// gnas dang mi gnas gnyis
med do// de phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen// 'di ni sku yi dngos grub yin// chos nyid cir yang ma mthong ba// thugs la yang dag don ma log/ bzlas shing gsal bar ma gyur pa// gsung gi
dngos grub shin tu yin// sa la mi brten lhun gyis grub// 'di ni lam rgan kun 'ong 'gro// thams cad 'dus pa'i dngos grub yin// rang bzhin rang la rang bzhin yin// rang byung rig pa zhes bya'o// 'di mi

snang ba gzhan snang med// gal te blo la snang ba de// don snang ma yin mtshan ma'o// de ni rang byung rig pa min// byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa las// chos nyid ji bzhin pa'i skabs//// de nas rmad du byung
ba 'di bka' stsal pa/ sems mi g.yo ba bde ba ste// sems kyi sems 'ching mi 'chor bas// sems la zhib pas brtag dpyad bya// shes bzhin gyis ni thang bcad de// sems kyi sems la bltas pas

na// cir yang ma mthong ma yengs pa// bsgoms na ma bsgoms bsgrubs na nyams// de bas 'byung tshor ci byung yang// rang byung rang zhi bsgom pa'i gtso// rang byung rang zhi tsam mi gdags// sems kyi spyod
'jug thams cad kyang// yi ge med pa'i ngang du bzhag/ de ni rgyal po'i rgyal sa'o// man ngag snying po'i rgyud ces bya// bde gshegs nyag gcig dgongs pa la// phyi rabs rnal 'byor don la ni// yang rab
bsam pa'i ting nge 'dzin// rab kyi rab kyis don la dpyad// byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa yi ge med pa las/ rmad du byung bar bstan pa'i skabs//// de nas sku gsung thugs su 'khor rnams rang bzhin
du bton nas bka' stsal pa/ byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa yi ge med pa'i rgyud 'di mthong ngam/ thos sam nyams su blangs sam/ don rtogs sam/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa las/ 'khor rnams kyi mgrin
gcig pas 'di skad ces gsol to// byang chub kyi sems yi ge med pa 'di/ bdag cag gi ji ltar 'tshal lo// zhes gsol pa las bde bar gshegs pa rnams slar yi ge med pa'i rang bzhin du 'dus

so// byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa yi ge med pa zhes pa'i skabs rdzogs so// 'di gong 'og gnyis med dang skabs grangs 'dra yang gsan yig na bzhugs rgyu gong ma 'di yin 'dra//// bod skad du/ byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa yi ge med

pa'i rgyud/ dpal bde ba'i mchog la na mo/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings rang bzhin med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang bzhin gyi 'khor la rang bzhin gyi ston pas rang bzhin gsung du
med pa bka' stsal pa/ rang bzhin rang bzhin tsam min te// de ni rang bzhin mi bzung ba// rang bzhin gab pa bag la nyal// rang bzhin gyi skabs//// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med de// gnyis na rim pa
can zhes bya// rim pa'i cha la mi brten par// de ka yi ge med pa'o// yi ge med pa'i skabs// rang bzhin tsam yang ma yin pa// de ni rang bzhin chen po'o// rang bzhin rang gis rtogs na
rtogs// thams cad me dang rang bzhin snang// bltar med bag la nyal ba de// 'bad pas mi rnyed btang snyoms tsam// de yang min te cir mi gnas// yi ge med pa'i skabs// 'di ltar snang ba'i khyad par
las// bdud bzhi mi 'byung rtog pa zad// nges thob sa chen khyad par 'apags// skyon bral rdzogs chen don las 'das// stong dang mi stong tshig las 'das// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun med// yi ge med
pa'i skabs// man ngag gsum dang gsang ba gsum// yi ge med pas 'di mi brtag/ stong pa chen po'i rang bzhin stong// de ni kun las 'phags pa yin// mchog 'phags khyad par chen po'o// yi ge med pa'i
skabs// mi dmigs mi rtog kun bzang ngang// rang ka ma la rang bzhin yang// bag chags kun bzang lhun gyis grub// gser med bong ba med pa'i sems// dran rtog bag chags ci byung yang// de nyid rang
bzhin yig med dang// mtshon pa las 'das dpe med pa// des na sgrub pa chen po'o// yi ge med pa'i skabs// gang yang mi bsam cir mi btags// mtshan bsam nyams te chags na 'khor// byang chub sems

su gdags pa med// 'di ltar spyod pa'i khyad par la// sems dang yid du rnam mi dbye// phye bas chags pa'i mtshan ma'o// 'di zhes gang la'ang gnas mi bya// bsgom chags skyon du ting 'dzin 'gro// yi ge med
pa'i skabs// lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes te// ye shes kun gyi thu bo yin// chos sku bde ba'i mchog yin pas// nam mkha' che'o ting 'dzin gtso// yi ge med pa'i skabs// rigs kyi bde bar gshegs pa

rnams// ting 'dzin 'bum sde'i don 'di ni// rab tu rtogs dang dpyad dka' bas// rgya chen rtsing bor rab dpyad la// phra mo bag la nyal ba dbab// gtan tshigs kyis ni ma yin no// byang chub kyi sems bsgom
pa yi ge med pa las/ bsdu ba gsungs pa'i skabs rdzogs so////

rgya gar skad du/ bo d+hi tsit+ta ma hA san+ti dz+nyA na sap+tA ka ra tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ byang chub kyi sems rdzogs pa chen po ye shes bdun 'byung ba'i rgyud/ dpal ye shes rdzaugs pa chen po la phyag 'tshal
lo// 'di skad bshad pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin ye shes rdzogs pa chen po/ gsang ba'i 'od gsal ba bde ba'i ngang nyid/ lhun gyis grub pa'i bdag nyid/ ma lus pa gcig gi rang
bzhin thig le chen po nyid/ 'og min gyi gnas/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa'i de bzhin nyid/ rig pa 'pho med pa'i gzhal yas khang/ cir yang gsal ba'i rgyan gyis bklubs pa na/ bcom ldan
'das rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po de/ rang bzhin gyi 'khor dang/ rang bzhin la lta ba'i 'khor dang/ rang bzhin nyid la gnas pa'i 'khor dang/ rang bzhin mngon du gsal bar gyur pa'i 'khor dang thabs

cig go// de'i tshe na brgya byin lha'i dbang pos/ gdul bya'i don shes nas/ phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba la 'di skad ces bskul to// dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyi// thun mong bya ba mthar bton nas// gang la nye
bar mdzes pa yi// dam pa'i gsang ba gsung du gsol// rtsol bral rig pa'i khyad par la// gnyis pa'i don de mi gnas te// de nyid snang ba'i byin rlabs las// ji ltar 'dod pa so sor gsal// zhes bskul
to// de nas phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpa' la mgrin gcig tu 'di skad bskul lo// rang gsal rig pa mchog gi sku// rtsol bral bstan pa thugs la
rdzogs// 'dod 'byung 'bar ba'i nor bu ltar// gdod nas kun rdzogs bdag tu gsal// rig pa lhun rdzogs dbyings la bzhugs// bdag gzhan mi mnga' phyogs ris bral// nam mkha' mi 'gyur rtag par
blta// rang gsal lhun grub rig pa khyaud// gang la rkyen gyis bskul ba ltar// thugs rjes sems dpar bstan du gsol// zhus so// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' la bskul bas/ lha'i dbang po'i ngol gsang ba'i
bdag por snang bar gyur to// de nas lha'i dbang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// rgyal ba kun gyi gsang ba'i thugs// kun 'dus byang chub sems kyi ngang// rang gsal nyag gcig dri med pa// bde chen khyed kyi

sku mchog gis// brjod bral gsang ba'i chos nyid 'di// tshig dang yi ge kun bral yang// de nyid brjod pas go bya'i phyir// ye shes gsal bar gsung du gsol// zhes zhus so// de nas phyag na rdo rje de nyid
rang gi ye shes gsal ba zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang nyid lta bu'i 'khor rnam par bkod pa las/ rnam par langs nas 'di skad ces bskul to// rang byung rig pa'i 'od 'bar bas// kun gsal
nyams myong bral ba 'di// brjod med rig pa'i don go nas// rtsol bral don la dgod du gsol// zhes zhus so// de nas skyes bu dam pa des/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rang byung rig pa
mchog gi don// rang rig 'od gsal gsang ba'i nyams// 'dzin pa'i dri ma kun gyis dben// brdzod bral rig pa dbyings la bzhugs// 'bar ba'i 'od kyi rnam pa ltar// kun tu gsal zhing nyid du

gnas// rang gsal rig pa chos dbyings la// cho 'phrul bdag rdzogs gnyis pa med// rna brgyud dag gi sgra tshig gis// 'phrul gyi me long ji bzhin du// gzhan mi btsal te rang la rdzogs// ci yang ma yin cir

mi dgongs// bsal med mi g.yo mchog gi lung// ji bzhin nyid la ji bzhin gsal// rkyen bral brda phrad don gyi lung// brdzaud med gsang ba'i nyams kyis so// rang byung mchog gi snying po la// yengs pa med
pa'i sems kyis gnas// rang gsal dmigs bral cir mi dgongs// shes med gsal ba mar me ltar// yin no gang du'ang sems pa med// 'gyur med chos kyi g.yung drung la// ci dgar bzhag pas g.yo med
lung// yul med bsam bral sgro skur can// ting 'dzin rig pa'i 'khor lo yin// bag chags 'dzin pa rnam par gcod// nam mkha' gsal ba'i mar me ltar// gsal la dmigs pa rnam par bcad// 'byung
'jug med pa'i thig le yis// gsang ba rig pa'i 'khor lo gang// ma rig gsal ba'i me long gis// khyab pas nam mkha' rjes su blta// rang byung rig pa rang gsal skyes// rgyu rkyen bral ba'i dbyings la
rdzogs// bsam pa spangs te dbyings la gnas// mi 'byung mi 'jug gnyis med ngang// spyad med de ltar rang bzhin gzhag/ btsal bral chu yi rang bzhin ltar// ma bskyed der bzhag don gyis gsal// de nyid
nges pa'i don 'di ni// bsam gyis mi khyab dus nas shes// mi tshol 'od kyi snying po ltar// 'du 'bral med par ye nas rdzogs// de kho na nyid yul med la// gnyis med rig pa gcig tu 'bar// gti mug sgo
nas bde ba rgyas// kun 'joms re ba'i snying po 'dra// mtha' bral mngon par mtho ba la// mtshan bral mi tshud gcig las med// des na rang bzhag dgongs patas gnas// kun la bsal te gcig la
son// 'gyur med sems kyi dgongs pa'o// ye shes bdun 'byung gi rgyud las/ gleng gzhi gsang ba'i le'u ste dang po'o//// kye sems dpa' chen po/ rang bzhin thams cad nyams kyis ni// bsdus te thig
le gcig tu gsal// rang gsal 'gyur med ye shes kyis// ji bzhin klong du gsal bar gnas// 'khor ba rang gsal nyid du bde// nam mkha' khyab pa'i 'od dang ldan// gsal ba nam mkha'i snying po
ltar// khyab pa kun gyi rjes su song// snang ba nam mkha'i mtha' ltar yangs// 'phrul gyi me long gsal ba'i 'od// phyogs ris med par kun la 'char// rgya mtsho gsal bas yid brtags
pas// khyab par gsal bas dbyings la bsdu// ma bcos rang byung snying po la// sgro skur dag pa'i dbyings la 'das// bsam pa med pa'i 'du shes can// rgyu ba'i yu ba rnam par bcad// kun snang 'od gsal
nyag gcig po// ci yang yin no gang yang rung// ma bkag yon tan de ltar gsal// rang rig yul med chos kyi dbyings// rang gsal ye shes kun tu bzang// rang byung rkyen bral 'jig pa med// ye shes snang
ba rnam par dag/ rdzogs pa'i ye shes klong du thim// mkhyen bral gti mug chen po la// shes dang mi shes yongs kyis med// rang gsal lung la kun rdzogs pas// gnyis pa'i chos dang gdod nas bral// rang
bzhin 'du 'bral med pa nyid// thig le gcig tu kun rdzogs so// gsang ba'i me long thabs kyis shes// kun 'byung ye shes phung po la// gsang ba'i thabs kyis rtogs gyur na// btsal bral 'od ltar khyab

par 'byung// kun la phyogs ris med par snang// phrad dang ma phrad nus pa las// de ltar de lta nyid du snang// phrad dang thob pa med pa yis// mi snang mi gsal rang bzhin gsang// sngon 'gro'i shes rab sbyangs

pa yis// lus dang srog la mi dpyad de// rna brgyud thob phyir dbul bar bya// ye shes rang gsal thabs rdzogs pas// ma brjod rig pa'i thabs kyis go// rang bzhag rig pa'i thabs kyis 'di gnyis med pa 'dra
go// rang bzhag rig pa'i shugs kyis go// rang bzhag rig pa shugs kyis gsal// 'gyur med gsang ba'i don la bzhugs// kun 'dus rig pa gsal ba'i nyams// brjod par mi rtog nyams kyis
gsal// gsang ba'i me long gsal rdzogs pas// brjod bral bla ma'i thabs kyis shes// gsal ba'i mar me dbyings la khyab// rig pa'i 'od gsal mchog gi thugs// gtad med yul la dus gcig
rdzogs// gsal ba mi mngon dus gcig mchog/ nges pa dus tshod de kho na// gsal med 'du shes bral ba med// rig pa'i klong la kun tu bzhugs// gang yang ma yin 'od gsal yin// mi 'brangs mi spyod

yul dang bral// brda phrad rig pa shugs kyis go// yang na nam mkha'i sa la'o// yang na chu bo'i rgyun la'o// yang na gsal ba nyid la'o// yang na mtshan ma'i sgra la'o// yang na de nyid gang min par// rang bzhin
rig pa gzhag pas ni// chu la chu ltar gsal bar gnas// mi shes pa nyid ma yin pas// 'byed pa med pa'i ye shes 'grub// rang gi nyams myong kun bral bas// brjod bral bstan pa rgya mtsho'i mdzod// sgra
bral rig pa thugs la rdzogs// gsal la bsam du med pas na// dmigs med rig pa rang gsal lung// thams cad rig pas mngon par shes// bsam du med pas 'dzin dang bral// sa le
dmigs bral gcig gi ngang// mi spyad mi 'dzin bsam du med// mtha' yi 'du shes rgyu ba med// bsam pas bsgribs pas don mi shes// gang du'ang mi bsam mi spyad de// rang gzhag rig pa nyid kyis

gsal// nyams myong bsam rtog yul zhes bral// rang byung nyid la nyid mi 'byung// rjes mi 'brang zhing yul mi tshol// mi 'phro mi sdud mi bcos te// mtha' dbus de bzhin nyid mi 'tshol// de bzhin nyid du rang
bzhin gnas// kun kyang rang gsal thig le nyid// spro bsdu med pa'i dbyings la 'du// 'das dang ma 'das chos kun kyang// rtsol bral 'od la rtag tu bzhugs// chu yi gnyer ma ji bzhin te// rig pa 'od
gsal dbyings la thug/ rang la spro zhing dbyings la 'du// nyi ma gsal ba'i snying po ltar// gsal la ma 'dres lhun gyis rdzaugs// kun kyang shi len na len 'dra// gang yang ma yin gcig tu gnas// ma yin
kun kyang rig pa ste// rig pa min la ma rig min// ri bo mes bsregs kun tshig ltar// rtogs pa'i rig pa rang gsal ba// 'dzin pa mi gnas rang gsal bar// spang ba med pa mnyam du gnas// gcig po
ye shes rdzogs lung la// don bral mnyam pa'i sems kyis blta// de nyid rig pa 'od 'bar lung// brjed med gsal ba'i don yin no// ye shes bdun 'byung gi rgyud las/ ye shes snang ba'i le'u ste gnyis
pa'o//// kye sems dpa' chen po/ rang gsal ye shes mnyam nyid la// sgra tshig brjod pa'i rig pa yis// rdzogs pa'i ye shes mngon gyur na// ye shes 'od gsal nyid du nges/ ma bslad rkyen bral nyag
gcig pa// rim pa ma yin dus gcig gsal// rtsol bral rig pa cir mi dgongs// cir snang rang gsal nyid kyi dbyings// ma btsal ma sbyangs ye nas grub// rig pa ma btsal mngon sum dbyings// smon du
med pa rang la rdzogs// dus med rang rig gsal ba'i lung// bskyod med chos dbyings dam pa nyid// kun kyang rig pa nyams su skyes// 'byung 'jug mi gnas cir mi dgongs// ma bslad ma bcos ye nas
'byung// brgya byin nor bu ci bzhin du// ma btsal gdod nas lhun gyis grub// rig pa ye shes 'od gsal du// mnyam dang mi mnyam chos mi gnas// mtha' dang dbus med ye shes klong// phyi dang nang med

chos kyi dbyings// ma skyes pa dang mi gnas pas// ma chags pa dang lhun gyis grub// gdod nas dag pa chen po la// sbyang zhing bgrod pa ga la yod// dus gsum rgyal ba'i snying po ni// rig pa'i ye shes rang
gsal yin// zab mo gsang ba'i nges don la// phyogs dang phyogs min chos mi gnas// rig pa rang gsal ye shes nyid// sbyang pa ma yin gdod nas grub// gnyen pos ma btsal de bzhin
nyid// ma bcos mi gnas rang bzhag pas// ji bzhin rang byung gnas pas gsal// snang srid 'khor dang 'das pa kun// rang byung rig par rang gsal bas// sgro dang skur pa'i chos mi gnas// btsal med ye
shes gsal ba ni// khyab par gsal ba'i dmigs dang bral// 'du 'bral med par ye nas 'byung// dmigs bsam mi spyad rang byung nyid// rang gsal rdzogs pa nyag gcig po// du ma'i chos kun rdzogs pa'i
ngang// che chung med par ye nas mnyam// rang byung dbyings las ma g.yos par// kun la snyoms pa'i thugs rje 'char// ci yang yin no gang yang rung// bsal med rig pa'i ngang la bzhugs// brjod bral mi
gnas tshig dang bral// de rtogs sgra yi 'khor lo yis// rig pa'i ye shes 'od du 'bar// gsal 'dzin mtha' yi thag pa bcad// rang gsal brda yis gsal bar byed// sbyang med shes rab rnam gsum
gyis// rig pa bde mchog gsal bar shes// gang zhig de yi rjes 'brangs na// rig pa rang gsal don mi mthong// ye shes gsang ba'i don las gol// bde mchog gsang ba'i lam dang bral// mtshan
ma 'khor ba'i lam du brgyud// rang byung gsal ba'i lam ma shes// rang bzhag rig pa'i rgyud tshig gis// ji bzhin ma bcos ngo bo la// brjod bral rang bzhag dgongs pa yin// rang byung dbyings las gsal
bar byed// ma bcos gsang ba'i dgongs pa la// bcos ma'i rnal 'byor log pa'i lam// mtshan bral bcos med snying po la// 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog log pa'i lung// gang dag rang 'dod phyogs cha
yis// 'dzin pa so sor mthong ba yis// phyogs bral ye shes chen po la// btsal zhing spyad pas don mi mthong// cir snang gcig gi ngo bo la// yengs pa med pas kun tu gsal// nyams myong brjod bral
bsal 'dzin med// 'di la phyogs ris gdod nas med// rang bzhag rig pa shugs kyis go// ma brjod brda yis gsal bar shes// dus gcig ye shes rang gsal bas// gnyis 'dzin phra rags kun gyis
dben// 'dzin med mkha' la nyi shar ltar// gsal la stong pa 'du shes med// gang yang mi gsal 'byed med lung// mi bsam rig pa cir mi dgongs// rang bzhag dgongs pa bsam mi khyab// yul bral
shes pa 'dzin rtsol med// ma yengs bsam med brjod bral lung// rang gi nyams kyis gsal bar shes// dbus mtha' med pa'i rig pa la// mi 'jug bsam pa'i sems kyis gnas// gang du'ang mi bzhag
rten bral bas// gzhag tu med pa'i don 'di la// de bzhin nyid la goms pa yis// dus gsum ma bcos dgongs pas gzhag/ rdo rje sems dpa'i dgongs pa'i don// ma bcos rig pas
gsal bar shes// tshig min don du mnyam sbyar nas// gang ltar bltas pas de ltar bzhag/ 'di ni rig pa'i nyams su brjod// gdod nas ma bcos lhun grub la// mtshan ma'i brda yis mnyam sbyar
nas// yengs med rang gsal bde chen la// ye nas de ltar gnas bzhin bya// bde ba de yi don go na// btsal med 'di ni rang la shar// rgyal ba'i dgongs pa dbyings la gtugs// spyod lam gang ltar bde
ba bzhin// rang rig gsal la mnyam par bsgom// ma spangs ma btsal shugs kyis gsal// bum pa'i rlan ltar de bzhin na// ma btsal rig pas 'grub par 'gyur// btsal na 'dzam chu rdo gzugs
ltar// 'od gsal 'khor ba'i khams su 'gyur// mi bsam mi dpyad dgongs pa'i klong// yengs med mtshan ma'i sgro skur bcas// gcig gis kun gyi rang bzhin gsal// dang po de nyid rang nyams
rdzogs// ma bcos nyams myong ting 'dzin te// 'khor ba rang gsal snying por grub// thams cad gsal ba'i maN+Dal// gsal la 'dzin med rang bzhag blo// ma bcos mnyam par gnas par bya/ ye shes bdun
'byung gi rgyud las/ rang bzhag rig pa'i ye shes mnyam par rtogs pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// kye sems dpa' chen po// ye shes goms dang rtags nyid dang// tshul dang blo yi tshul nyid de// rang
bzhag thug phrad mnyam nyid de// rang byung rang gi nyams la shes// rang gsal ma yin gzhan las min// gnyis kas ma yin khyad par gsal// rang rig yul med dus gcig gsal// yin dang ma yin phyogs
med klong// kun gsal rig pa'i sgo phye nas// yengs med ma bcos don la zhugs// snying rje bsam med phyogs su brdal// yul med ma bcos de bzhin nyid// ma bsams mi gnas khyad par 'gro// ye nas
rig pa'i klong du zhugs// brjod bral gsang ba'i gter la spyod// gsang ba'i rig pa lung gi tshul// 'di dang gzhan zhes 'dzin sems bral// blo yi rig pas cir mi dgongs// gnyis med rang gsal ye shes
la// dran bsam rig pas ci brtags kyang// bya bral rig pa cir mi 'dzin// bsam pa'i blau yis cir mi spyad// rang bzhin 'khor lo rim par bskor// 'jug med 'jug bral dgongs pas gnas// bsam
gyis mi khyab chos kyi dbyings// mtshon pa lam gyi rgyud dang bral// gsal bar shes te rgyu ba bral// cir yang mi 'dzin de bzhin nyid// gdod nas lhun gyis grub pa'i ngang// rang byung 'od gsal gcig la
rdzogs// mi gnas rig pa'i dkyil 'khor la// ma bsal ma bsgrubs gdod nas gsal// 'byung 'jug med pa'i ye shes kyis// yengs med dbyings la thabs kyis 'jug/ 'khor ba ye nas
sangs rgyas pas// 'od gsal dag pa nyid du gsal// ma bsgribs kun la khyab pa'i 'od// thams cad gsal bar rang bzhin 'char// 'di la sbyang bgrod yul dang bral// 'di la bsam dpyod mtha' dang
bral// 'di la rtsol bsgrub mtha' dang bral// 'di la dgag bsgrub kun las 'das// kun gyi snying po rang byung la// rig pa gsal bar nyams myong la// kun kyang rang gsal mnyam par mkhyen// yul med rang
gsal gcig gi lung// du ma gcig tu gsal bar shes// kun kyang lhun grub snying po nyid// du mar 'dzin pa'i chos mi gnas// mi bsam mi dpyad rang bzhin gzhag/ nam mkha'i rdo rje rnal 'byor pas// snang
srid thig ler mnyam sbyor zhing// nam mkha' 'od gsal mnyam par mkhyen// chags pa mi mnga' zhen pa dag/ mi 'phrau rang gsal gnas pa dang// 'khor ba lhun grub snying por gsal// ma bcos gsang ba'i

sgo phye nas// dam pa lung dang rigs pa 'phrad// rgyal thabs rig pa gdeng gis 'phags// snying rje phyogs ris med par 'char// ting 'dzin rig pa klong du son// ma chags dag pa'i spyod pa yis// kun bzang
mdzad pa'i nges pa can// khams gsum sku gsung thugs gsal bas// sku gsum zhing du rig pas sbyor// ye shes rol pa rang 'char bas// phyogs ris med pa kun las 'byung// rdzogs pa'i 'od gsal mnyam
sbyor bas// thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor rang bzhin 'char// byin rlabs ye shes 'od 'chang bas// ma lus snying po nyid du mthong// gdod nas ma bcos 'od gsal bas// ma yengs gsal ba'i gdeng gis
bzhag/ dpal ldan nam mkha' rgyal ba'i sku// ma bcos nyi ma'i snying po ltar// drod rtags cho 'phrul rang bzhin thob// dmigs med lhun grub rol pa ni// mdzad pa'i gar thabs sna tshogs pa// rig pa gsal
bar thabs kyis shes// nyams myong mi sel bsam pa spangs// sku gsung rang bzhin dus gcig rdzogs// snying po rang bzhin khyab pa ni// gcig gis kun gyi rnam pa 'dzin// bsam gyis mi khyab dus gcig
'brel// tshul ni gang du'ang mi spyod pa// yengs pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyis// bsam gyis mi khyab dbyings la gsal// bdag min gzhan min gang yang min// ma bcos chu la chu bzhag ltar// rang bzhag rig
pas gsal bar shes// sgra bral rig pa'i ye shes kyis// ma btsal gyin 'dar bshad pa go// ma bcos gsang ba'i rnal 'byor pas// ma brjod rdzogs pa'i shugs kyis go// mi spro mi bsdu gsal bar
gnas// tshig bral bstan pa rgya mtsho'i mdzod// dbyings las dbyings gsal sgrib pa med// ma bcos rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor la// 'di yin 'di min phyogs ris med// blo yi rang bzhin ma skyes
pa// rig pa'i rang bzhin bsam dang bral// phyi dang nang med bde ba'i klong// gsal la dmigs 'jug mi gnas pa// zag med mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngang// ma yengs ma btsal sems kyi gnas// 'di ni rang rig
sems kyi lung// brjod bral rig pa nyams kyis gsal// drug thug kyang 'phrad dran rig med par gsal// ye shes bdun 'byung gi rgyud las/ ye shes rang gsal gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// kye sems dpa'

chen po/ gang gi rang bzhin gsal ba la// log pa'i phyogs kyis bsgrib pa de// rang gsal brda don phrad pa yis// btsal bral rig pa 'char bar 'gyur// kun 'byung snying po byang chub ni// rnam par mi rtog rgya

chen zab// dmigs bral rig pa'i klong du 'das// drug gi chos dbyings bzhin yang yul med pa// rang byung snying po gcig la rdzogs// ye shes mkha' mnyam sgra don med// gsang ba'i ye shes rig pa'i lung// sgro

skur med pa nyid du bstan// phyogs med ye shes khyad par gsal// kun 'byung sgra brjod bral ba la/ thig le spros bral mkha' ltar dag/ rang byung dag gi snying po la// gang ltar brtags pa phyin ci log/ zhen
drug log pa'i rtsol brgyad kyis// ma bcos gsang ba'i dgongs pa bslad// 'dzin sems log pa'i lcags kyis bcings// mtshan ma 'khor ba'i 'dam du bzung// zhen chags log pa'i mdud pas
bcings// phyogs bral phyogs su bslab pas 'khor// log pa'i ri bos mngon du bkag/ spros bral 'bar ba'i ye shes la// mtha' yi zhen pa mi gnas kyang// don la log pa'i byis pa yis// rnam rtog 'khor
ba'i khams su brtags// dung la ser por 'dzin pa ltar// dngos la gnas pa ma yin kyang// log par mngon par zhen pa'i mthus// rang snang ma bcos zhen par brtags// yod med mthong ba 'khrul pa'i
lam// de nyid mthong bas grol bar 'gyur// spang 'geg 'khrul pa ngal ba'i lam// ma bcos rtogs pas gol bar 'gyur// gzung 'dzin lta ba gnyis kyi chos// gnyis 'dzin bral bas grol bar
'gyur// gnyis kyis gcig pa'i nyes med lam// gcig tu rtog pas grol ba'i lam// spong len mthong ba che chung la// gsang ba'i nges bstan gcig gis grol// bsnyen bsgrub dag pas dag pa bsgrub// ye
nas zin pas gzod sgrub rtsol// btsal med rtog pas grol bar 'gyur// rgyu 'bras 'dzin pa gnyis kyi lam// gnyis med rig pa 'grub par 'gyur// brda don phrad pa'i rim pa yis// rig pa gsal ba'i don
rtogs na// mi rtog rnam grol bde bar gshegs// gsal la nyams myong gang yang min// 'du shes kun bral dbyings nyid du// rig pa mkha' ltar gnas par bya// tshad ma mngon sum chen po
la// rjes dpag shes pa phyin ci log/ mngon 'byung rang gsal rig pa la// rjes 'jug mtshan ma cir mi dgongs// gnyis med gsal bar rtogs pa la// mi bsam mi spyad gnas na grol// ji ltar gnas
pas bzhag par bde// rang bzhag rig pa chen po la// yengs pa med pas yang sangs rgyas// ye shes gsal bar gnas pa yis// che mchog bla na med pa'i sa// nges rtogs lung gis de ma thag/ rang byung byin

rlabs ngo mtshar che// gsang ba'i me long thabs kyi tshul// 'du shes bral bas rab tu bde// ye shes bdun 'byung gi rgyud las/ ye shes gsang ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// kye sems dpa' chen po/ rang byung

rig pa mchog nyon cig/ rdo rje gsang ba rang byung ba// rgyu med rkyen bral chos kyi sku// rig pa'i 'khor lo bsam mi khyab// gsang ba'i 'khor lo rtogs par dka'// ye shes 'khor lo gsang ba'i ngang// ting
'dzin gsal ba'i mar me la// bsam pa'i 'dzin pa kun dang bral// kun la gnas kyang bsam dang bral// mkha' gsal mnyam pa rig pa'i dkyil// snang 'byung rig pa 'bum phrag yas// gsal la dmigs
pa med pas na// bsam med dran med mi g.yo ba// rnam par mi rtog mchog gi lung// spyod lam rnam bzhi mi gnas pas// mi ldog ye shes ngo bor gsal// snang ba rnam rtog cir mi blta// dran 'byung rtog pa'i

rjes mi 'brang// ma bsgul ma rnyogs chu bzhin du// ma bsal bzhag pas sgrib pa 'byung// mi rtog mkha' ltar gsal ba la// ye shes nyi ma phyogs brdal bas// ji bzhin rang bzhin rnam par dag/ rgya mtsho g.yo
med ji bzhin du// rnam rtog mi g.yo cir mi dgongs// rang byung gsal ba nam mkha' che// ma lus gsang ba nyid la 'dus// gsang ba kun 'dus rig pa'i gter// mkha' khyab rig pa'i sems nyid ni// khyab
par gsal la 'dzin pa med// rang byung rig pa rang shar ba// khyab par gsal la dngos po med// rang rig gsal ba'i ye shes kyis// ma bsgribs gsal ba nyid du mkhyen// rtog med 'od gsal sems kyi
dbyings// gsang ba rang byung rig pa'i klong// rdzogs chen thig le ji bzhin la// mnyam par dgongs med rig pas gzhag/ byung tshor g.yo 'gog ji snyed pa// gsal med rig pa nyid kyi gsal// rdzogs chen
ma bcos dgongs pa la// gang ltar bcos pa log pa'i lam// ma bcos rig pa mnyam sbyar na// sgro bral rig pa'i 'khor lo las// thugs rje rig pa'i byin rlabs ni// ma btsal nyi ma'i 'od ltar
'byung// gsal ba mtha' dbus med pa la// rig pa mnyam pa'i sems kyis blta// gtang 'dzin med pa'i rig pa yis// rang byung lhug par gzhag par bya// rang byung rig pa cir mi
dgongs// rang gsal 'khor lo rgyun mi gcad// ye shes bdun 'byung gi rgyud las/ ye shes 'khor lo'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// kye sems dpa' chen po/ rang bzhag rig pa'i dgongs pa ni// ji bzhin
mngon du gsal byas nas// rin chen 'bar ba'i 'od gsal bas// sems kyi dkyil 'khor 'bar bar byed// 'dzin bral rig pa'i chos dbyings la// bsam med 'gyur med mkha' ltar gnas// bsam gyis
mi khyab chos kyi dbyings// gang dag byis pa'i 'du shes kyis// rang byung rig pa'i ye shes la// bsam bral rig pa'i mtshan nyid de// bstan pa don gyis go bar zad// dngos grub rin chen 'od ltar
'byung// zag med phra bkod mkha' dkyil la// nyi zla gza' skar bkram pa ltar// ma 'dres rig pa dbyings la gsal// de nyid mi gnas rang bzhin ni// kun 'byung rin chen phyogs med shar// 'phel 'grib
rtog pa mi gnas pas// nyi ma'i 'od ltar lhun grub pa// kun la ji ltar 'dod par 'char// mkha' ltar khyab la gsal ba che// mi rtog dbyings kyi ngang la gsal// 'od dang 'od can ji bzhin du// ma btsal
lhun gyis grub pa'o// ma yengs yal bzhag dgongs pa'o// bsam med rig pa'i gdeng gis zhi// sbyangs pa ma yin gdod nas dag/ ma bgrod bla ma'i sa mchog ni// dus gcig gnas pas bgrod du

med// phyag rgya mi 'ching sngags mi zlos// tshogs dang mchod pa mi byed de// kha dog bri dang mchod pa yang// ma byas dngos grub mchog tu gyur// ji srid rtsol ba'i rnam grangs dga'// de srid log pa'i grong khyer
te// ma btsal ma sbyangs gdod nas dag/ snying po rig pa'i phyag rgya can// gsang ba 'od gsal klong la 'jug/ brjod bral sgra yi dkyil 'khor la// nyan bral rig pa'i tshul gyis gsal// gsal ba nyid na mi
dmigs pas// rtog bral nam mkha' dbyings kyi klong// 'di zhes bya zhing dmigs pa med// ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin gnas// rang bzhag rig pa yengs med klong// phyogs med ye shes khyab par
gsal// gnyis med nam mkha'i dbyings ltar gsal// ye shes bdun 'byung gi rgyud las/ ye shes grub pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos/ 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang
bcas pas/ rdo rje sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan 'das/ rang gsal lhun gyis grub pas rtsol ba kun dang bral// bsam med dpyad 'dzin bral bas dgongs pa dam pa mchog/ ci
yang mi bsam bsam pa rtogs pa'i rgyun// dgongs pa rang byung lhun grub khyod phyag 'tshal// bltar med spyad med mthong mang ye nas de bzhin nyid// lnga pa'i rgyal por phyag 'tshal gnyis med khyod
la 'dud// mthong bar mi rig brda tshig kun dang bral// ma byas ma bsgrubs ma btsal lhun gyis grub pa'i ngang// rang gsal ma bcos rig pa gang yang min// thig le 'phro 'du ma yin bdag nyid lhun gyis
grub// phyogs bral lhun grub 'od gsal rig pa rang byung dbyings// rtsol 'jig mi gnas gsal ba'i mar me 'dra// bstan pa'i rgyal po yang gsang rig pa'i gter la 'dud// de nas gsang ba'i yang gter
'di// rin chen gsal ba'i glegs bam 'di// ston pa rdo rje sems dpa' yis// gsal ba'i rig pa rgyas btab nas// mkha' dkyil sbas pa lha dbang gi// spyis blang yang dag dbang thob nas// sprul pa nyid
la rab tu bshad// de nas rdo rje'i gdan stengs su// yang sprul thugs kyi sras rnams la// rgyal thabs spyi blugs dbang bskur nas// ma bgrod rtog pa'i 'jig las bsgral// rnam grol sa la bde bar
gshegs// de bzhin 'od gsal rnal 'byor la// shes rab dag pas mnyam sbyor na// rdzogs chen lhun grub sa la sbyor// gang zhig dad pas 'dzin klog la// bsod nams brjod par mi nus te// skal ba

dman pa'i yul min la// srog dang bral ba'i kha bzhin bya// rgyal tshab nges pa gcig la gtad// sbas pa thugs kyi nyi ma 'di// yang gsang rig pa'i gter du gzhag/ gnas kyang sgrom du nges par sba// ye shes
bdun gyi rgyud las/ rjes su yi rang ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// ye shes bdun 'byung ba'i rgyud sems kyi me long chen po rdzogs so// 'di mtshams rna brgyud zam pa 'dzud////

rgya gar skad du/ ma hA san+ti d+harma tA bo d+hi tsit+ta mang+ga la ni yA ma pra ka Ta s+thi ta tan+t+ra na ma/ bod skad du/ rdzaugs pa chen po chos nyid byang chub kyi sems bkra shis mi 'gyur bar gsal bar gnas pa'i rgyud ces
bya ba/ dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ngang chen las/ bde bar gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das// sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po
dpal// rdo rje sku gsung thugs kyi bdag/ bde chen lhun gyis rdzogs pa yis// phyogs dus bde gshegs kun bdag nyid// dkyil 'khor chen pos mdzes par brgyan// snang ba rnam par 'phrul pa yis// ma
'gags che bar rab tu bkod// dkyil 'khor kun 'byung bzang mo'i mkha'// kun bzang cho 'phrul ma 'gags par// sna tshogs kha dog rnam gsal zhing// sna tshogs dbyibs brgyan tha dad pa'i// so so'i bya
rtsal 'gag med chos// sgrib med nor bu'i mdangs lta bu// thams cad yid la mi gzhag pa'i// de nyid gsum du sangs rgyas pa'o// zab mo'i mtshan nyid brjod pa'i tshig/ smra las 'das pa'i tshul

'jug cing// chos rnams thams cad de lta bu// dpe yi tha snyad kun tu bral// rang nyid ngo bos ston byed pa'i// mthar thug chos kun rgyal ba'i gsung// theg pa'i bye brag rgya chen po// ma lus lus pa med par
sgrogs// so so'i mtshan nyid gsal ston cing// thabs mkhas 'gro ba'i rgyud smin mdzad// thams cad gzod nas zhi ba'i chos// nam mkha' lta bur skye 'gag bral// rang bzhin lhun grub 'gyur
ba med// gcig tu ma nges sna tshogs dngos// ma 'dres yongs rdzogs gsal ba yi// yul sems gnyis med me long ltar// gnyis can dngos can ma lus pa// mtha' rnams kun las grol ba yis// zung
'jug gnyis med gnyis su gsal// bdag don rdzogs pa'i stobs rdzogs pa'o// gdul bya'i dbang po khams rnams dang// skye mched bye brag ci lta ba// dus phyogs rgyun kun bsdus pa rnams// so sor rtogs
gsal rgyu 'bras bzhin// rdzogs pa'i rtsal gyis kun don spyod// bya ba mthar phyin skyo ngal med// bdag nyid chen po'i rang bzhin la// spros med snying po byang chub sku// rtsol sems yul bral bde chen
rgyal// thams cad mkhyen pa lha yi lha// gzhal yas khyad par 'phags pa'i tshul// mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis dang// dpe byad brgyad cu'i bdag nyid can// bde ba'i ye shes kun 'byung gnas// stobs
bcu khyu mchog ltar mdzes shing// drag po'i las stobs 'joms par byed// mi 'jigs bzhi ldan seng ge'i tshul// dpa' bo chen po gzhan gnas 'joms// dam pa'i longs spyod rgyan bklubs shing// dbang
bcus btsun mo lta bur gshegs// byin rlabs 'khor lo bsgyur rgyal bzhin// sna tshogs chos la longs spyod rdzogs// kun 'byung rol pa kun tu bzang// phyogs bcu'i snang ba mtha' yas las// rang gi dkyil

'khor tshul bzhin ston// kun mdzes 'khor lo kun 'byung zhing// rab bzhag me tog rgya mtsho'i rlabs// 'od zer snang ba sprin gyi shugs// las rab rdo rje che ba'i sde// go cha sra ba theg mchog brgyan// dpal gyi

nam mkha' 'dra ba'i 'od// ye shes snying po glu yi dbyangs// phyogs gnon gzi brjid phreng rgyal ba// byang chub brtsegs mdzad snying po can// las tshogs 'jug pa thar pa'i gru// rdo rje snang ba tshul rnon
pos// phyogs rnams kun nas bskul mdzad do// 'bru yi phung po tshul mchog shis// rang gnas zhing khams dkyil 'khor kun// ma lus 'dus pa'i thig le che// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i
tshogs// phyogs bcu kun nas 'dus pa dag/ bde gshegs sku las snang ba ste// byang chub chos nyid rtsal rdzogs pa// byams pa 'jam dpal la sogs pa'i// rdul phran grangs med dkyil 'khor
kun// bkod pa chen po tshul bzhin du// rang rig phyogs mtshams gnas te 'khod// de ltar chos dbyings rgya chen po// bde gshegs sras bcas ma lus dang// rang bzhin lhun grub sangs rgyas kyi// 'og min
gnas bzhin kun tu khyab// de dag gsang ba bla med pa'i// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// chos rnams kun kyi de bzhin nyid// sku gsung thugs la ston par mdzad// bde gshegs thugs kyi thugs

mchog nas// rim bzhin brgyud pa'i gzhan don du// zab cing rgya che gnyis med pa'i// rgyud 'di bstan pa'i tshul 'byung ba'o// blo mchog byang chub sems dpa' dag/ rgyal ba'i yul la 'jug bya'i phyir// nges

don tshig gis mtshon byed pa// rnam 'phros snyan nas snyan du grags// spyi yi ston pa gnas mchog 'khor// khyad par rgyud kyi tshul 'byung bas// dus ldan sdud po tshad ma te// phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyur gyur
pa'o// rdzogs pa chen po chos nyid byang chub kyi sems bkra shis mi 'gyur ba gsal bar gnas pa'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// bde chen kun tu bzang po nyid// rang gi ting 'dzin gnas
bzhugs te// 'khor tshogs kun la longs spyod mdzad// 'di dag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor che// yon tan kun 'byung ma 'gags pa// sna tshogs rol pas tshim gyur nas// dus gsum ston pa'i tshul mnga'
ba'o// thams cad chos kyi de bzhin nyid// bde gshegs byin rlabs rmad byung ba// dgyes pas 'khor tshogs thams cad la// gnyis med tshul du bstan par mdzad// de tshe sku las 'od zer dang// 'dzum
mdangs byin rlabs phyag rgya'i tshogs// rol pa'i phrin las kun tu+u bzang// stong gsum g.yo zhing gsal bar mdzad// snod bcud sangs rgyas thams cad kyang// kun nas 'dun pas phyag 'tshal zhing// bde
gshegs byin rlabs rol pa'i rgyan// sna tshogs yon tan gsal bar snang// rdo rje sems mchog gtso bo yis// mi gnyis ye shes kun brtags te// rang gi gnas las bzhengs mdzad nas// khyu mchog mi
'jigs tshul gzigs shing// chos kun 'bras bu'i ngo bor bzhugs// rol pa'i byin rlabs bsam mi khyab// phrin las sna tshogs rnam kun spyod// drag po'i gtum tshogs zhi mdzad cing// tshe dbang 'byor rnams
rgyas pa'i tshul// gzhan dag 'dod don dbang gi las// mi mthun gnas kun gsad pas 'dul// las tshogs phrin las mtha' yas pa// skad cig yud la grub par mdzad// bya ba rdzogs pa'i mdzad pa
yis// yul las grol ba'i phrin las bdag/ sangs rgyas kun 'dus ston pa'i gtso// che ba mnga' brnyes tshul gyis brgyan// kun tu chos sku 'du 'bral med// kun tu longs spyod gnas su
rtags// kun tu sprul sku'i rgyun ldan pa// kun tu 'khor ba mya ngan 'das// chos dbyings grong khyer nyams dga' ba// 'og min mngon par mtho ba'i zhing// gnas mchog stug po bkod pa'i khams// gnas kun
zil gyis gnod byed pa'i// rnam par 'phags pa'i theg pas bstod// yon tan ma 'gags pa yi brgyan// dus gsum sangs rgyas bzhugs pa yi// gnas mang 'dus pa'i mchog rgyan can// dam pa rin chen

tshogs kyis spras// 'dod longs bsam pas 'grub pa dang// dkyil 'khor lha mo'i rgyan bcas pa'i// khang pa gru bzhi sgo khyud can// sgo khang rta babs rgyan gyis mdzes// twa ra Na bzhi'i tshogs bkod pa// rdo rje

'khor lo rin chen gzugs// pad+ma sna tshogs mtshan ma yin// ka gdung phreng ba steng 'og logs// pa tra'i phreng ba phyogs dang mtshams// rnam gsal shar bu do shal dang// 'phan gdugs rgyal mtshan rnga yab

dril// rin chen 'bar ba'i khri steng la// zla ba nyi ma pad+ma'i gdan// stobs mchog mi 'jigs rdzu 'phrul dang// thogs med shes bya'i gang chen mtsho// rang gi de bzhin nyid la bzhugs// de tshe 'khor tshogs rgya
chen po// gnyis med mnyam par 'khod pa yi// rang bzhin rnam dag ngo bo nyid// dmigs med gsal ba'i yul 'jug pa// mnyam nyid zung 'jug gnyis su med// kun gsal rtogs pa sna tshogs rgyud// mdzad

pas don kun mthar phyin tshul// sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bo nyid// bdud bzhis mi bskyod thugs kyi dngos// tshul bzhin snang mdzad sku yi mchog/ kun 'byung phung po yon tan che// rnam dag dri med chags mdzad
gsung// kun tu phrin las don yod pa// bde gshegs thams cad tshul 'jug pa'o// chos dbyings kun tu skyon dang bral// gnas kun rnam dag gzigs pa'i spyan// 'dod pas sdud byed yon tan bskyed// dri
med na bza' smin pa'i sku// kun spyod thugs rjes sgrol bar byed// bcom ldan gnyis med 'brel pa'i gzungs// pha rol phyin de grol ba'i zla// yon tan bkod des rgyal po dpal// pad+ma rnam dag 'jig

rten spyan// rnga sgra sgrogs byed stobs mchog las// byams chen mya ngan dri ma med// yon tan kun 'byung spobs pa brtsegs// dpal gyi seng ge bdud dpung 'joms// gzi byin phung po rin chen mdzod// pad+mo'i
mtshan mchog rgya mtsho mchog/ 'khor tshogs gzhan dag bskul bar byed// thams cad blo gros gcig par gyur// gsung gcig tshul gyis gsol 'debs shing// sna tshogs mchod pa rang la 'bul// phyag 'tshal
yang yang gsol ba 'debs// gus pas thal sbyar rtse gcig pa'o// rgyal ba kun gyi de bzhin nyid// ye shes snying po'i gnas bzhugs pa// sku gsung thugs las sprul pa'i tshogs// rgyu rkyen med
par ston mi mdzad// bde ba rab ston gtso bo mchog/ thugs rje dri med dngos po'i don// phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor kun snang ba// rgyu rkyen gang las byung ba yin// 'gog pa mi mnga' thugs rje
can// pad+ma'i spyan ring kun tu gzigs// rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i dgongs don gsang// dus 'dir snang ba'i skabs la sogs so// de nas kun bzang bde chen dpal// thams cad chos kyi don mnga' bas// rang
gnas ma g.yos kun tu snang// phyogs bcur ston pa'i tshul bzhugs shing// pad+ma'i gar gyis gdul bya'i tshogs// kun 'dus ye shes bskyed par mdzad// thams cad gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// byang
sems bde bas dbang bskur zhing// dam tshig chen po'i gnas bstan te// blo gros snod kyi khyad par bzhin// rdzogs chen byang chub sems kyi don// thabs mang sgo nas bstan par dgongs// 'di dag thams
cad sangs rgyas nyid// byang sems bde ba'i snying po can// ye nas gnas te 'gyur ba med// yon tan tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i gzhi// rgyu nyid dag ste rkyen 'bras bu// rnam dag bde gshegs dkyil 'khor
las// glo bur 'khrul pa'i rigs rnams kyis// byang chub sems las rtogs pa'i chos// chu yi rlabs kyis rgya mtsho bzhin// ma g.yos rang sar gnas ma rtogs// rgyu rkyen 'bras bu'i gnas las gzhan// byang
chub bde chen don bral ba// dus 'dir thugs rje chen po'i shugs// thabs mang theg bsdus nges mchog don// ston pa'i tshul ldan khyed rnams kyis// legs par bzung byos bdag gzhan don// sngon gyi sangs
rgyas rnams kyi bka'// dgongs pa'i don mchog gnyis med pa// da lta ma 'ongs rlabs pa'i lam// gnyis med 'bras bu theg pa'i mchog/ nges par chos kun sngon gyi gnas// bde gshegs 'byung gnas tshul
kun ldan// de las lhag pa'i gnas med de// rang byung ye shes gsal ba'i rgyun// zhes gsungs so// rdzogs pa chen po chos nyid byang chub kyi sems bkra shis mi 'gyur ba gsal bar gnas pa'i rgyud las/
gleng slong ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' la// rigs bzhi'i rgyal ba bde gshegs bcas// yum tshogs 'khril pas bstod byas te// mchod cing phyag 'tshal 'dun pas gnas// e
ma ho bde gshegs kun gyi sku// mtshan bzang dpe byad phun sum tshogs// kun 'byung snang ba 'gag med pa'i// yon tan rgyan gyi rin po che// dpe bral dpe nyid grangs las 'das// rdo rje lta bur 'gyur ba
med// mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pa yis// yon tan phrin las g.yul las rgyal// brjod 'byung gsung snyan gsang sngags phreng// mi rtog ye shes kun nas gsal// dus kun bdud rtsi'i tshogs

bral zhing// thams cad mdzad par rnam par rol// khyod mig ye shes dri ma med// kun 'byung rgya mtsho gnas mkhyen pas// thams cad chos kyi de bzhin nyid// byang chub gsang ba'i sngags don mchog/ ston pa ji

ltar sangs rgyas pa'i// rnam grol gsang 'byung lam 'bras bu// byin rlabs rang gi ngo bo sku// tshul 'byung gleng gzhi ji ltar chags// gsang gsum dam tshig gtso bo yi// dkyil 'khor nyams dga' mthong ba

las// rab tu grol ba'i sangs rgyas gang// rim par byung ba tshul ji ltar// ye nas lhun gyis grub pa'i dbyings// rang bzhin gnas pa'i rgyal ba mchog/ de las rab tu gsal byas pa'i// byin rlabs cho 'phrul

ji ltar snang// sna tshogs ngang nyid rang bzhin sku// bdag nyid chen po mi dmigs pa'i// so sor brtags pa'i cha shas nyid// shes rab gdams don spyod pa'i yul// spros bral de bzhin nyid rtogs pa'i// dam
pa'i shes pa ji ltar skyes// gang la mi rtog ji bzhin nyid// bsgom bya 'jug pa bdag nyid che// mi rtog gnas pa ma 'gags chos// gsal bar drod rtags rnam snang sku// kun tu bzang po 'gyur ba med// yon

tan ma 'gags sgrib bral chos// don bzhin spyod pa'i rgyan gyis spras// lta bsgom 'bras bu byang chub lam// theg pa'i tshul kun las dpags pa'i// bya brtsal rtsol ba'i nad med pa// kun gyi dbang phyug lhun

grub gnas// chos kun 'bras bu chen po'i sku// bya ba'i tshul spang mya ngan 'das// byang chub 'khor ba'i gnas la bzhugs// kun gyi thun mong ma yin pa'i// dpe yi 'thad pa ci lta bus// don gyi snying po btsal
bar bya// bdag gzhan ngo bo ji ltar 'tshal// thams cad sku mchog ye shes che// brgyan chas gtan la dbab pa'i tshe// dus 'dir 'khor lo gnas kun la// dri med 'bras bu theg pa'i mchog/ rigs mchog
shes rab nam mkha'i dbyings// byang chub sems nyid bshad par mdzod// rdzogs pa chen po chos nyid bkra shis mi 'gyur ba gsal bar gnas pa'i rgyud las/ de kho na nyid zhus pa'i le'u ste gsum
pa'o//// sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos grub mchog/ rdzogs chen byang chub sems kyi dbyings// shes rab chen pos brtags dka' ba'i// gnyis med ting 'dzin dam pa las// stobs mchog gtso bo zhi mdzad

de// chos kun snang gsal ston par mdzad// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba'i gzugs// ma skyes skye ba cho 'phrul sgo// ma 'gags phyag rgya chen po'i chos// snang med dkyil 'khor sna tshogs byung// brjod med
zab mo rgya chen sogs// rang byung ye shes kun gsal gzhi// yon tan rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor las// mdzad pa sna tshogs kun tu snang// de nas kun tu bzang po dpal// shes rab gzungs dang

'khril sbyor zhing// phyogs dus kun tu gzigs dgongs nas// chos kun ji ltar sangs rgyas pa// rang gi ngo bo bshad par mdzad// ston pa'i bye brag grangs med mod// gnyis snang thun mong khyad par tshul// spyi

yi sangs rgyas snang srid dngos// khyad par rgyud tshul rtogs pa'i don// rgyu 'bras gdul bya'i snang ba bzhin// rigs mchog dkyil 'khor bla na med// dngos por gzungs kyang byung ba'i tshul gyis ni// bstan
pa'i dkyil 'khor rig pa'i mchog/ stong gsal rdo rje thugs kyi dngos// sra brtan bde gshegs sku yi mchog/ tshogs kyang bsreg smin pad+mar rnam dag gsungs// gshed sdud rin chen yon tan tshogs// g.yo

yang las rab phrin las che// ye shes chen po'i rnam 'phrul las// rig pa stong pa byin rlabs te// bde chen byang chub sems kyis brgyan// kun snang stong pa go snyoms skyes// zung du 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid
can// de dag so sor ma 'gags pa'i// dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i thig le nyid// 'gro 'di ye nas sangs rgyas te// kun snang rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal// 'dod chags gsang gsum dbang mdo
gsungs// zhe sdang thugs rje rdo rje'i rgyal// gti mug mi 'byed chos sku gshegs// nga rgyal bdag bral yon tan rin// phrag dog rtog bral las nyid du// ye nas rnam dag lhun gyis grub// gzugs phung bde
gshegs sangs rgyas sku// tshor ba rin chen bkod pa'i tshogs// 'du shes mtha' yas sna tshogs rgyun// 'du byed don grub tshogs pa'i bdag/ rnam shes rdo rje 'gyur ba med// snang ba rang rgyud mtha' bral

'di// rigs mchog lha mo gnyis med sbyor// zung 'jug gsang ba'i sngags ldan pa// bskyed pa'i dus na skye med cing// zag med ye shes lhag pa'i rgyun// lbu ba rdos mtshungs chu bur bzhin// smig rgyu chu shing

snying po nyid// snang grag dri rgyun ro yi rdzas// reg bya'i bde ba chos rnams kun// yum gyur lha mo stong pa nyid// gnyis med lhun grub chos rnams kun// bde chen bla na med pa'i sku// zab mo gsang ba'i dkyil
'khor che// rang bzhin lhun grub bde chen dbyings// ye shes lhun grub rtogs gsal ba// dam pa'i brgyud rim dgongs pa'i don// gnyis med rdzogs pa byang chub sems// dus gsum gcig par rtag
bzhugs pa'i// bcom ldan bdud bzhis mi shigs pas// rnam dag dkyil 'khor kun 'byung sku// mtshan bzang dpe byad gtso 'khor ldan// gsang gsum dam tshig 'da' mi byed// thams cad kun mkhyen sgrib
bral sku// rigs mchog bkod pa'i grong khyer dbus// gnyis med gzugs sku 'khril ba las// dbang tshogs zhing khams bkod pa dang// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor skyong zhing// mi gnyis ye

shes che lnga ldan// sprul sku'i mdzad pa rgyun mi gcad// rang gi yon tan longs spyod rdzogs// thugs rjes gzhan la kun ston cing// stong gsum til gyi gong bu ltar// thams cad ma lus med par snang// de dag
gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// dbang bskur byin rlabs sngags kyi mthus// rang gi dam tshig mchog la gnas// thams cad chos kyi de bzhin nyid// dam pa'i bka' thob 'jigs las grol// grong khyer
gsang ba'i gnas mthong nas// shes rab chenapo nges par gnas// phung po khams sogs skye mched rgyun// thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid du// byang chub sems kyis gcod byed cing// de yi rang bzhin de
nyid de// gnyis med zung du 'jug pa'i tshul// gsang ba bzhi las lam 'bras bu// res kyi dmigs pa'i dus na snang// rgyu rkyen 'bras bu mi 'dogs shing// mtshon byed lam gyi rim par byung// bde gshegs

sku lnga ye shes lnga// 'bras bu gsang chen ye nas gnas// ma rtog rtogs pa'i thabs ston kyang// khyad par chos las gzhan na med// des na rgyal ba kun gyis kyang// byang chub sems las 'da' ba med// 'di
nyid kun gyi yum gyur yum// chos mdzod kun gyi gzhir gyur pa'o// de rtogs gnas las 'gyur med cing// chos kun byang chub chen po'i lam// smin cing grol ba'i thabs dam pa// theg pa kun gyi rtse mo

mchog/ gsang ba bdud rtsi 'thung byed pa// rgyal ba kun gyi sras mchog yin// rang gi rang bzhin gsang ba las// bde gshegs sku dang ye shes la// nyon mongs rnam dag byang chub sems// chos lnga ldan pa'i
sangs rgyas ni// gzhan nas 'byung zhing thob min te// bsod nams ye shes gter las skyes// thams cad rang gi ngo bos stong// dngos gcig sgyu ma chen po'i dngos// ya mtshan rmad du byung ba las// sangs

rgyas rnams ni gzigs mo mdzad// dbang po drug la brten bya ste// nang gi rnam shes skad cig rgyun// gzugs kyi chos sku snang srid stong// sgra yi chos sku grags su stong// dri yi chos nyid tshor ba stong/ ro yi chos
kun myong bas stong// reg bya'i chos kun reg pas stong// chos kun bsam pas rnam par stong// rab 'bring tha ma'i dngos kun gang// bde chen ye shes nyid kyi dngos// sangs rgyas kun gyi byin rlabs
kyis// nam mkha'i mthar thug khyab par gnas// kha dog dbyibs rgyan yon tan tshogs// dus gsum rang gi mtshan nyid ston// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi// rang bzhin ngo bo rnam par
'phrul// theg chen chos kyi 'khor lo nyid// rtag tu rang gi gnas na gsal// A li kA li mnyam sbyor bas// dbyings dang ye shes bde ba'i rgyun// zab mo gsal ba'i sngags lam nas// rgya che
rnam par 'phrul pa 'byung// thams cad kun tu bzang mo'i mkha'// kun bzang ma 'gags gnyis med la// de nas bde gshegs thams cad dang// sras bcas byang chub sems kun gyis// rgyal ba'i bka' la
yi rang nas// mngon par bstod cing mchod pa mdzad// e ma ho sangs rgyas bcom ldan sku// yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas// kun tu chos 'khor rgyun mi 'chad// dkyil 'khor sna tshogs 'khor lo
mdzes// zhes so// rdzogs pa chen po chos nyid byang chub kyi sems bkra shis mi 'gyur bar gsal bar gnas pa'i rgyud las/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs ston pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// gzhan du rnam
par 'phrul pa'i sgo// grangs med kun gyis gzigs pa dag/ sangs rgyas kun gyis bkod pa de// byin rlabs yon tan rgyud las byung// de dag 'khor gyis the tshom las// ston pa'i snang ba sgo dbye
mdzad// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis// dus gsum snang ba'i lung bstan mchog/ stong gsum 'jig rten mtha' yas pa// rdul snyed bgrang ba'i mtha' las 'das// dbyibs rgyan snang ba sna tshogs
kun// brtan g.yo sangs rgyas zhing khams mchog/ rin chen bkod pa'i gnas 'di yi// phyogs bcu rab 'byams bskal pa'i dus// bgrang 'das gsum gyi bar mtshams su// ston pa ji ltar sangs rgyas
zhing// bstan pa'i 'dul ba'i snod ji ltar// byung tshul gsang ba'i khyad par don// 'di yi thog ma grangs med nas// skyobs pa can gyis sbyin pa'i klong// gang zag 'phags pa'i rigs mtshungs pa'i// chos

skyong rgyal po'i blo gros dang// chos kyi sems dpa' sems bskyed do// yun ring sbyin sogs 'gro ba'i don// re zhig na yang rang sangs rgyas// rdzu 'phrul mgyogs pa zhes bya bas// grong khyer kun tu rnam 'phrul
ston// mya ngan 'das pa'i sku gdung la// 'od byung rkyen gyis sems kyi don// chos nyid snying po'i 'du 'bral med// rtogs tshig sgrogs shing gnas byas te// dus kun 'gyur med gsal ba las// thams cad
mkhyen pa'i yum sbyor te// sgrib tshogs bag chags gnas su dag/ bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen rdzogs// phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor sa le bar// rgyu rkyen 'dra bar 'bras bu'i chos// stobs bcu mi
'jigs bzhir bcas pa'i// mtshan dpe rgyan sogs spyod yul dang// zhing khams yongs su dag par 'gyur// de yi tshe na stong gsum 'di// lan grangs du mar g.yo zhing bskyod// lha yi rol chen me tog
char// 'od bcas phyogs bcur 'khrigs par 'gyur// me tog snying po 'jig rten khams// snying po dus zhes bya ba ru// 'gro kun byang chub lam la bkod// khyad par gsang ba'i rgyud don
sgrogs// theg pa chen por 'jug 'dod pa'i// shes rab snying rje'i bdag nyid can// 'gro rnams gsang ba'i gnas mchog 'dir// dbang bskur dam tshig sbyin par mdzad// gsang mchog rnam par thar pa'i

sgo// zab cing rgya che theg pa'i mchog/ bden gnyis zung du 'jug pa'i thabs// 'bras bu lam du ston pa'o// rtsa shing ri rdo sa sogs las// byang chub sems nyid mtshon byed pa// rgyal ba'i mthu yis ston byed

par// thams cad bde chen byang chub sems// rdzogs pa'i chos nyid skye 'gag med// rang byung ye nas lhun gyis grub// yon tan dkyil 'khor ma 'gags pa'o// rgyu nyid rnam dag rkyen dang bral// rdo rje lta bur

'gyur ba med// rang bzhin dngos tshogs ma 'gags pa'i// ye shes chen por rtsal snang ba'i// phyi nang bar gyi tha snyad dang// yod med dbus su 'dzin pa'i chos// thams cad mtshan bcas glo bur ba// mnyam
nyid dbyings su 'gyur ba med// dgongs don ma mthun 'gal ba'i tshig/ gsang sngags tshul nyid brjod pa dka'// rang bzhin bden pa'i gtan tshigs kyis// kun rdzob tshul dang 'byung 'jug sgo// gsang
mchog gsang ba rmad du byung// sangs rgyas kun gyis bstod pa'i gnas// de nas 'khor gyi gtso bo mchog/ dpa' bo rgyal mtshan zhus pa'i tshig/ rab dga' grol ba'i sde bcas pas// bde gshegs bstan pa

gzung bar bya// yun ring shes rab mthu rtsal can// thar pa'i grong khyair gsal bar 'gyur// bar gyi bskal pa gnyis kyi dus// bya dka' grong khyer pad+ma'i mtsho// kun rgyal nyi ma'i rigs las skyes// rig 'dzin
byams ldan bcu drug gis// so sor gter gyi 'byung gnas la// sngon dang byang chub mchog sems bskyed// gsang sngags dkyil 'khor 'jug pa'i thabs// dbang bskur dam tshig dri ma med// shes rab rnam

dag rgyas pa'i mthus// mthong ba'i tshe la rnam par grol// sgrib tshogs bag chags gnas ngan len// rang byung bde chen rdzogs pa'i sku// sku mchog mtshan dang dpe byad gsal// gsung mchog sprul pa'i yi ger
ldan// thugs mchog skye med dbyings su rtogs// yon tan ma 'gags phr-in las rdzogs// dus mtshungs sku gsum ye shes kyis// zhing khams bcu drug sbyor bar mdzad// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i
tshogs// grangs med bkod pa kun tu gsal// ri rab rgya mtsho grags pa'i gling// mu khyud mtha' can gser gling dang// gshog mtha' mtshon cha zhi ba'i gnas/ bde yang// 'od bkod sA la'i 'byung gnas
skye// don mchog ut+pal bzang po can// dpal ldan pad+ma'i phraing bas mdzes// lha yi bkod pa yan lag skyes// mkhas rtse yon tan lha yi rigs// sangs rgyas gser can me tog can// dbang phyug
drag po rdo rje'i snying// rin chen phyag rgya yon mchog lha// thugs rje chen pos sa bsrung mdzad// seng ge bde gsal 'gugs byed dbang// zhi ba'i bshes gnyen kun tu brgyan// grol te dpal gyi zla ba'i

'od// rang gi zhing khams grangs med par// theg pa sna tshogs 'jug pa'i thabs// 'khor gyi gtso bo gsang ba'i snod// smin mdzad grol ba'i dbang mchog bstan// thams cad gdod nas ma skyes la// snang ba'i
dngos kun gdang ma 'gags// rang bzhin byang chub sems kyis brgyan// ye shes chen po'i gnas la skyes// man ngag snying po de bzhin nyid// chos kun 'byung ba'i rtsa bas te// dus gsum gcig par 'gyur

med par// gsang ba'i rgyud du 'brel pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mchog// ye shes blo gros sdebs sde yang bzang khab// gus btud snyan pas blangs byas te// 'gro la phan phyir gzung med cing// byang
chub sems kyi gnas 'jug pa'o// lnga yi sangs rgyas dgongs pa'i rgyud// mi gnyis rim bzhin brgyud pa'o// de las bskal pa lnga yi dus// zhing khams seng ge'i rtsal zhes par// kun mtshungs sngon 'phags
grags pa can// gdul bya khyad par 'phags pa'i rigs// sangs rgyas kyis 'jigs seng ge'i dregs// mar me sngon 'phags rgyal po'i sprin// tsan+dan bkod pa'i sde bcas pa'i// sangs rgyas byang chub sems
dpa' rnams// rang rig snang ba'i zhing khams kun// 'od bcas theg pa'i 'khor lo spyod// grangs med bskal par tshogs bsags shing// yun ring theg pas rgyud sbyangs pa'i// dpal gyi snying po'i 'od zer

can// skar ma stobs bskyed dra ba'i sde// rang gi ston pa'i zhal nas su// nges pa'i snying rje chen po yis// gsang sngags zab mo lam gnyer zhing// rtse gcig brtson pas 'dud par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor gsang
bar dbang bskur te// theg chen dam tshig mchog la bzhag/ nges pa'i phyag rgya gsang ba yis// bskal pa mang po sgrib spangs shing// 'bras bu byang chub sems la sbyor// yon tan kun 'byung bdag por

'gyur// rdo rje lta bus kun bcom nas// kun tu 'od bzang ma chags spyan// yi ge 'khor lo bla med gnas// sku lnga ye shes che rgyud sbyor// rim bzhin de 'og bskal pa lngar// sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur
zhing// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams la// gsang mchog theg pa ston par byed// byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i bshes// rab bdag 'od zer snang ba'i sgo// bstan pa'i rgyud chen bzung byed cing// rnal
'byor dbang phyug 'khor bcas skyong// 'di ltar snang zhing srid pa'i chos// rgyal ba'i bstan pa dgongs pa'i don// ma 'gags gsal ba sku dang gsung// thugs kyi sgo nas ngang tshul ston// ya
mtshan bde gshegs dkyil 'khor las// dngos po'i rigs kun sna tshogs la// rtogs pa'i rgyud kyis gnyis su brtags// mi rtog ye shes mi 'gag pa'o// 'bras bu ye nas gnas pa'i chos// thams cad don
gyi rang bzhin yin// gsang mchog byang chub sems kyi dbyings// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa nyid// skal ldan byang chub sems dpa' la// thabs mang phyag rgya'i sgo nas ston// de 'og bskal pa drug cu

na// skar ma 'tshogs pa'i 'jig rten du// mya ngan mun 'joms chos kyi grong// sangs rgyas mi thub zla ba 'gyur// rgyal sras 'bar ba'i blo gros kyis// theg chen gsang ba'i blo skyes nas// bsam pa brtan pos
gsol btab cing// tshad med go cha bgos pa'i mthus// dkyil 'khor gsang bar dbang bskur cing// rgyud rig dam tshig 'bogs par mdzad// gnyis med mnyam par bzhag pa'i mthus// kun gyi chos nyid
don gsum la// bde chen rtogs pa'i byin rlabs shar// sgrib bral sangs rgyas rgyan gyis brgyan// dus gzhan spos ngad ldan pa yi// gnas su 'gro ba'i don la gshegs// thub pa chen po phyogs bcu
yi// sangs rgyas kun byon dbang bskur 'gyur// 'khor gyi sangs rgyas byang chub sems// 'khor bcas kun la theg pa'i gzhung// dus gsum gsang ba'i gdams ngag mchog/ chos kyi zhing khams skyong bar

mdzad// byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mdzad// gang phyir dngos 'di sna tshogs pa// thams cad chos kyi de bzhin nyid// smig rgyu chu zla'i dkyil 'khor dang// sprul pa dri za'i grong khyer tshogs// sgyu ma rmi lam sna

tshogs yul// mig yor me long bzhin lta bur// brag cha sgra snyan gzhan gyi dbang// nam mkha'i me tog mo gsham bu// tshig dbang don la de ma skyes// kun snang nam mkha'i lbu ba bzhin// rtsa ba med pa'i byang

chub sems// chags med dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor na// kun bzang ye shes rnam par 'phro// 'khor ba nyid na mya ngan 'das// nyon mongs rtog tshogs byang chub lam// 'khor ba nyid na mya ngan 'das// de bzhin
rnam par thar pa'i theg/ dad ldan mchog la ston par mdzad// de 'og bskal pa nyi shu na// grangs spyod 'jig rten mngon rgyu+u bar// sangs rgyas mi g.yo gtsug tor can// snyan pa kun grags 'khor dang
bcas// dus der dga' ba chen po'i shugs// 'bad pa chen po brtse ba can// khyim bdag skyabs mgon mya ngan med// bka' nas gzhon nu snying stobs can// bzhi po dus mtshungs theg chen byang chub
sems// bsdoms sngon nas 'gro ba mang la brgyud// dkyil 'khor gsang bar dbang thob cing// snying po 'da' dka' 'jigs med gnyis// dka' spyod grags pa mtha' yas dus// mya ngan gnas
bral bde ba can// stobs rgyu dang ba'i rgyal mtshan du// nges par sangs rgyas cho 'phrul tshogs// stong gsum 'jig rten gnas kun g.yo// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs// chos kun gdod nas dri
med par// byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan gyis mtshan// rgyud chen gsang ba'i don rnams kun// skal ldan mos pa'i rim bzhin bstan// de las byang chub sems dpa'i sde// rdo rje rgyal mtshan la sogs

kyis// byin rlabs yon tan rjes su grol// bsam 'das dri med gzung bar byed// de ltar dpal de chos kyi gdugs// dad sgrol 'od zer phreng ba can// rgyal ba kun gyi grogs mdzad cing// thar pa'i grong khyer
bdag por 'gyur// dmigs med yul tshogs gnyis med sems// rdzogs chen byang chub chen po'i dbyings// sangs rgyas kun gyis gzigs pa'i yul// bde chen snying po rang bzhin nyid// phyogs bcu dus
tshogs bsam yas par// thams cad thams cad 'dud pa'i gnas// nyon mongs sdug bsngal rgyud rnams kun// glo bur nyid de bde ba'i zhing// sprul pa ma 'gags dkyil 'khor kun// sku gsung thugs yon

phrin las thugs// rgya mtsho gsal ba'i nyi zla bzhin// phyogs bcu khyad par mtshungs pa'i mdos// kun rtogs rlung gis mi 'gyur ba'i// mtsho gting gsal ba'i rin po che// ji ltar gnas pa de lta bu// sangs
rgyas thams cad dgongs par mdzad// slad kyi 'gro gzhan gzhug pa'i phyir// mtshon rgyud tshig gis gtan la dbab// yun ring brtan pa'i gzugs brnyan gyis// rgyal ba'i dgongs spyod ston par byed// mthar
gnas bskal pa bcu gcig na// mchod 'os bde ba'i zhing khams der// rgyal po yon tan lag gi gnas// bkod rgyal gnas srung nyi shu gcig/ grogs mtshungs yun ring tshangs par spyod// byang chub snying por
sems skyed pas// sangs rgyas 'brug sgra'i bstan pa la// dad brtson cig char rab tu byung// dkyil 'khor gsang bar dbang thob nas// zung 'jug theg pa dam tshig gnas// shes rab ting 'dzin 'gyur med
par// sangs rgyas sa mchog sgrib med gnas// dus nas 'gro gzhan don gyi phyir// mthong dga' mthong ba la sogs pa// yon tan kun gyis mngon 'phags pa'i// smon pa'i mchog chen la sogs byung// yon
tan dus ring sbyangs pa yi// 'khor tshogs kun la gsang ba'i rgyud// rim bzhin bstan pas grol bar mdzad// mnyam nyid gsung bral sngags kyi tshig/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i shugs// rang gi sde
dang dpung 'khor bcas// rgyal ba'i bstan pa gzung byed cing// ded dpon bzang po la sogs pas// rab bstod gsang ba mtshon par byed// rang bzhin gsung tshig brjod pa'i rgyud// de tshe rgyal

ba'i byin rlabs kyis// 'byung tshogs phyi rol rdzu 'phrul pa'o// rgyud chen gnyis med zung 'jug pa'i// me long dkyil 'khor rnam pa bzhi// chos 'byung mtshan bcas ma 'gags pa// sna tshogs rang bzhin byang

chub sems// gzungs sogs ngo bor gang bzung ba'i// don snang ma bcos rig pa'i tshogs// phyi rol tshul 'byung ye shes nang// goms pa'i mthu las snang ba'o// de 'og sum cu 'pho ba'o// srung byed gnas kyi

gzhon nu'i sde// rgyal po smra ba'i mchog 'dzin pa// sangs rgyas baiDUr rgyal ba byung// bram ze'i rig byed gtso bo mchog/ dung phreng gnyen pa'i ston pa yis// dang po theg pa rgya cher tshul// dga' bas gong ma'i
gnas bgrod kyang// nges pa'i ting 'dzin yul ma rtogs// dus 'das sems kyi de bzhin nyid// chags med sgrib tshogs kun dang bral// bsod nams ye shes tshogs las skyes// thams cad mkhyen pas chos
kun gzigs// rang byung ston pa gtso bo la// sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs la sogs pas// dbang bskur mngon par bstod cing mchod// 'jug sel khyab pa'i gtso bo dus// mi 'khrugs dpal gyi tog tu
'gyur// dus gsum de bzhin gshegs kun dang// sras bcas dgongs pa 'gro bar byed// skal ldan rnal 'byor gsang ba kun// sems bskyed gsang ba'i gdams ngag mnos// tshegs med rtogs pas chos

rnams kun// zab cing rgya che 'du 'bral med// ye shes chen pos yul kun sbyangs// yon tan kun nas 'byung ba'i sku// thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnyis med sgo// sku gsung thugs mchog rgyan kyis spras// de tshe

zhing khams thams cad nas// rang bzhin me tog phreng ba spos// rol mos bar snang gang gyur cing// 'gyur ba'i ltas chen bcu drug byung// thams cad ya mtshan ngo mtshar gyis// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
lhags// 'di ltar rnam 'phrul gang lags pa// 'jig rten mgon gyis lung bstan mdzod// 'di ni rnal 'byor skal ldan dpal// nyi 'od zla ba'i gzi brj-id 'brel// ri rgyal bkra shis mdzes pa can// sor
phreng mu tig dpal rab 'byor// chos rgyal mtshan bzang dpa' bo skyos// grogs byed brtse ba'i yid gzhungs brtsegs// dus mtshungs bco lnga phyogs gcig tu// mnyam grol rgyal ba'i yum la sbyor// phyi dus
stobs 'phel dag byed gnas// rim bzhin 'gro ba'i tshogs la gshegs// kun gyis bdag gi bstan pa 'di// 'gro ba kun la gsang bar ston// ma lus 'jig rten 'dir snang ba'i// 'byung chen phung khams
skye mched dang// nyon mongs 'gro ba'i tshogs bcas kun// ye nas ma bcos 'gyur ba med// rigs mchog lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil// ye shes chen po mngon gsal ba// phyogs mtshams dus
kyi rnam phye yang// rgyan gyi bkod pa gnyis med pa// 'chi 'pho 'du 'bral rnam pa'i yul// byang chub bde chen dbyings su zhi// dmigs pa'i yul la ye shes che// gsang rgyud gsang chen gsang ba'i
mchog/ sems nyid chos sku rnam bcus kun// gzugs sku nam mkha'i mtshan nyid can// rnam gsum gsang ba'i sngags brjod pas// don gcig ro mnyam sbyor ba'i rgya// ye shes dbyings kyi bdag nyid la// ye
shes rgyan tshogs gsal bar 'byung// de las de 'byung de gnas pa'i// de nyid de bzhin de kun dngos// zung du 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid ni// tshig bral dpe yis ston par dka'// rang rgyud dag pa'i ye shes
de// rtogs pa'i dus na grol ba yin// de la bdun gyi dus chen po// gzhan dag gzi brjid cher 'bar ba// zhing khams bcu ldan grags pa can// mthu stobs gzhan gyis sde 'jig pa'i// sa srungs rgyal po bu
lnga bcu// legs sbyangs sangs rgyas rin chen mang// mdzad pa'i sgo nas 'jug byed pa// des bsags gcig la gcig bskul zhing// theg pa chen por sems bskyed pas// sngon chad rtogs pa'i bka' drin
gyis// mngon par shes pa lnga gsal gyur// 'gro kun las rgyu gang las byung// rgyal ba'i bstan pa dri med don// gnyis med chos la bdun par gnas// dus gzhan dge ba'i bshes gnyen la// dbang thob
gdams ngag ji lta bar// mngon gsal dag cing dri ma med// ye shes chen po'i stobs rdzogs nas// rdzogs ldan rin chen yod pa'i gnas// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas mtshan mthun par// rgyal ba'i dgongs pa
mar me mdzad// zhing khams dag par rdzogs longs spyod// sprul sku rdzogs par tshul 'dzin par// 'khor gyi sangs rgyas byang chub sems// gdul bya dag pa sna tshogs la// byin rlabs bkod don rol pa'i
tshul// bde gshegs kun gy-is dbang bskur te// thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor 'phrul par mdzad// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs pas// gsang ba bla na med pa'i rgyud// phyogs rnams kun tu rnam spros
te// skal ldan 'jug pa'i don bzhin bshad// rdo rje mi dmigs 'jigs pa med// bdud bzhi la sogs tshogs kun 'joms// rnam dag chos kun snang ba'i gzhi// phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin gnas// 'di

dag rmad byung sku dang gsung// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam snang ba// byin rlabs cho 'phrul 'dus ma byas// rnam stong stong nyid bde ba'i mchog/ gnyis su rtog pas gang spyod pa// der 'dzin mtha' la ltung bar
'gyur// gcig pur brtags pas 'ching zhing grol// gnyis chos gsum la de bzhin te// bzhi nas grangs med mtha' yi bar// gol sgrib byang chub sems dpa'i lam// phyogs bltas 'dzin

pa'i sdug bsngal nad// chags bral bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho nyid// dus gzhan 'dus pa brgyad kyi tshe// rgya mtsho gnas grol 'od rgyan du// byang chub sems dpa' gser sdong gis// dam bcas 'jig rten sgrol ma'i
dus// sbyin bdag dus kyi phreng ba can// dam pa'i theg chen blo skyes te// dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa las// byang chub sems kyi sdom pa blangs// dgon pa'i phyogs su gnas bcas te// rtse gcig shes rab
ting nge 'dzin// chu bo rgya mtsho kun las brgal// chos kun sems nyid 'od gsal bar// nges par sangs rgyas dam pa dang// legs phrad gsol 'debs ji lta bar// dbang bskur dam pas zung 'jug

tshul// gsang ba dam pa'i rgyud 'dzin pa'i// zhing khams bkod pa gdugs mdzes su// 'khor lo rgyun du sangs rgyas bskor// yid bzhin rgyal po chos skyong 'khor// rgyal ba sras bcas mang po kun// rnam grol
phung po mtsho chen gyis// yang dag dngos bcas gtan la phab// rin chen mdzod kyi sgo 'byed cing// dad dgu'i nor bu snang bar mdzad// gang 'di rnam par 'phrul par mdzad// chos nyid byang chub sems
rdzogs par// rang byung sku mchog 'gag med par// byin rlabs kun tu bzang po'i rtsal// dus 'dir rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu ni// rang bzhin ngo bo dbyings na gnas// rtsol bral 'bad pa'i shugs las skyes// sku
gsum gnyis med gnas pa'i tshul// smon lam las kyi stobs gnon pa'i// lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes che// go ba'i dus nyid grol ba'i tshul// yon tan 'bras bu gzhan rgyud bral// slad ma dus 'gyur gzhi che

ba// rol pa chen po 'gyur ba'i skabs// zhing khams mchod sdong chen po ru// sangs rgyas sgron gsal stobs mchog ldan// rigs na bzo gnas la spyod pa// rig pa'i rgyud sbyangs gzhon nu bdun// sngon gyi skye ba
dran pa mthun// phyogs gcig smon lam btab nas gsol// dpal gyi rir gnas sems bskyed pas// bde gshegs thugs rjes bzung bar mdzad// dkyil 'khor chen por rang zhugs nas// dbang thob dam
tshig la gnas shing// thams cad chos kyi de nyid gsal// rang byung ye shes kun la gsal// rnam grol gsang ba bla med sgo// sa bcu'i dbang phyug de bzhin gshegs// tshe gcig sngon sbyangs 'bras bu'i
mchog/ sku gsung ye shes mnga' brnyes pa'i// dus 'dir 'jig rten ngo mtshar ches// 'jig stongs chags shing gnas pa dag/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bde bas khyab// kun gyi mngon shes zag pa med// phyogs
bcu'i sangs rgyas kun byon te// ya mtshan dgongs pa bgro bar byed// e ma khyed rnams rang byung sku// dad brtson snying rje che las byung// rim gyis brgyud rim ma brten par// sems kyi dkyil

'khor gsang bar gyur// thams cad chos kyi de nyid mchog/ rgyal ba kun gyis byin gyis brlabs// rnam thar 'di la nged kyang grol// rang byung sbyangs pa'i stobs las 'khrungs// don 'di gdul bya gzhan gyi
phyir// yun ring gnas pa bstan pa legs// de dag mchod sdong zhing khams mchog/ bde gshegs dpal gyi rgyal mtshan dang// blo rtsal sman chen mun pa sel// rgyal ba'i sdom par dpag med stobs// rim

bzhin gdul ba yid 'ong ba'i// zhing khams bkod pa 'khor tshogs dang// bstan pa thams cad rnam grol zhing// snying po mchog gi ting 'dzin gnas// gsang sngags rgyud las rnam spros te// thugs rje ye shes
gnyis med tshul// sna tshogs rnam par spros byas kyang// zab mo byang chub sems nyid brgyan// kun 'byung 'dod pa'i yon tan kun// ma bkod dkyil 'khor rol pa'i gnas// rang bzhin dbyings kyi rgyan
tshogs kun// zhen pa gnyis 'dzin chags pa'i lam// de nas rtsol bral bde chen sku// 'gro kun rang byung yin mod kyang// rnal 'byor gsum gyis gtan la dbab// de nyid 'brel tshugs theg pa'i
mchog/ ces gsungs so// rdzogs pa chen po chos nyid byang chub kyi sems bkra shis mi 'gyur bar gsal bar gnas pa'i rgyud las// 'das pa'i dus su byung ba ste lnga pa'o//// de nas kun bzang bde
gshegs nyid// bzang mo'i yum dang sbyor mdzad cing// rgyal ba'i thugs nas brgyud pa dag/ byin gyi rlabs kyis bshad pa'i phyir// dpa' bo rigs kyi dkyil 'khor tshogs// kun la tshul 'di ston cing
gdams// bzang mo me tog phreng ba grags// zla tshes rgyal po'i sras bcas par// bcu bzhi'i phyogs dus gnas bcas te// smon lam snang ba bzhi bzhir byung// de dag snga ma'i sangs rgyas mchog/ yun ring
mnyes par rim gro byas// phyogs bcu'i dge ba'i bshes bzung zhing// 'gro kun gnas su sems bskyed do// bsod nams tshogs mchog rgya chen po// rnam grol ye shes tshogs bskyed mdzad// bar skabs
gsang ba'i theg par zhugs// dbang thob dam tshig la gnas shing// bstan pa'i gdams ngag bzung bar byed// 'bras bu'i lam de de 'bras bu// de stobs dus der sangs rgyas mchog/ mang po phyogs bcur
bzhugs kun la// so sor sems bskyed smon lam btab// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs kun gyis// dbang bskur gdams ngag ji lta bar// rnam grol ye shes zag pa med// sku gsung ye shes chen po'i
tshul// yon tan phrin las kun tu gnas// gdul bya'i don 'byung sangs rgyas pa// zhing khams chen po'i snang ba 'phrul// shar gyi spos dang 'od zer can// zla mdangs 'dod bzhin rin chen
dung// sangs rgyas dam pa dri med sku// gtsug tor 'og min gnas kyi bdag/ pha rol phyin de rdo rje'i dpung// grol ba zla ba rin chen tshogs// yon tan bkod pa pad+ma'i gdung// dpal gyi rgyal po las

rab ston// bde gshegs chos dbyings snang ba yi// yon tan rgyal po'i sde dpung bzhin// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs// ye shes chen po'i rnam sprul las// ma 'dres rnam par grungs pa yi// rang
bzhin bden gnyis chos kyi rgya// dus der sa yi rgyal po ba// bdag dang yul de'i 'jigs byed chas// rab skyong dka' thub lu ma'i gnas// rgol ba'i dbang phyug de bcas pas// 'dus byed rgyal po
'jig rten du// dag pa bzhi ldan dgongs pa bzhi// theg pa gsang ba'i sgo 'byed cing// rnal 'byor dbang phyug bskyed par mdzad// phun sum tshogs pa kun rdzogs te// de nyid yon tan gzhan la snang// theg
chen gsang ba sbyor ba yis// ma lus lus med rgyud kyi don// shar lho dga' dbyangs dgod byed snang// sa yi me tog 'gog pa'i tshal// pad+ma rnam dag 'jig rten spyan// rang byung gsang sngags sgo nas

'khrungs// rnga sgra sgrog byed stobs mchog las// mdzad tshul rgya chen theg pa'i tshul// byang chub sems nyid don la snang// bcu gnyis mdzad sogs 'gro don spyod// 'od gsal ye shes chen po'i sgo// rigs kyi
dkyil 'khor rdo rje las// bde gshegs rin chen pad+ma'i chos// las rab rdo rje kun spyod pa'o// dag pa'i 'khor tshogs bde gshegs sogs// rang snang gzhan las 'ongs pa rnams// gnyis su med kyi bkra

shis brgyad kyang brgyud// 'dod pa longs spyod kun gyis spras// de tsher tshar char ka yang ga stobs chen dga' ba'i dpal// 'khor los sgyur ba gnas spyod pa// bkod pa chen po'i dpung rgyas pa'o// de 'dul theg pa

mchog bstan cing// rdzogs chen byang chub sems su sbyor// de yi bstan pa mchog 'dzin pa'i// sde pa mang po gyes par 'gyur// yun ring gnas pa'i rgyud sde kun// byin rlabs rang gis chos bstan pa'o// lho
phyogs rin chen yod pa'i tshal// nyi 'od kun khyab dpe 'od bzhin// snang ba'i pad+mo yid 'ong mchog/ thams cad rin chen rgyan gyis mdzes// byams pa'i rgyal po rin chen mchog/ mya ngan dri ma rnam par
sel/ yon tan kun 'byung 'dod pa'i tshul// spobs pa brtsegs pa'i ri bo mchog/ mnyam nyidarin chen sngags las skyes// rdo rje bde gshegs pad+ma las// tshul chen snang bas sde dpung 'joms// bde gshegs
byang sems rigs kun 'joms// yul bdag rgyal po dgyes mchod dang// lag bzang 'gros mdzes la mtsho'i rgyal// btsun mo gnas kun longs spyod cing// rin chen zhing khams rgyan dang
bcas// phyi rol gzhan du mi 'dzin par// thabs mchog nang gi gnas kun spyod// bstan pa'i rgyud sde don zhi bas// dam pa'i gnas kun gsal bar ston// byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi mchog/ shes rab

snying rje che mnga' ba'i// blo gros rgya mtsho grangs med kun// phyag rgya gsang sngags stobs kyis 'phags// rgyal po gdug can gangs ri mchog/ yid 'ong tsan+dan sbyin pa'i lha// sder bcas theg pa chen po'i
lam// 'bras bu gsang ba'i gnas la bkod// lho nub 'od gsal can gyi gnas// gya nom dbang po'i grong khyer mtsho// 'gag pa'i 'khor lo byang chub shing// 'od bzang dpal 'byung lha mo'i grong// dpal gyi
seng ge 'jigs pa sel// bdud dpung 'joms pa'i stobs mchog rgyal// gzi brjid phung po rin chen mchog/ rin chen mdzod gnas gdung ba sel// zhing khams bzod pa'i mchog dag tu// yongs su dag

pa'i 'khor dang bcas grags kyang/ yun ring 'gro ba'i don la dgongs// bstan pa'i gsang sngags sna tshogs mchog/ slar yang sprul pa 'gro ba'i tshul// theg pa'i lam kun rnam par sbyor// gnyis med gnyis su
med pa'i sgo// bya bral bya bas bgrod pa'i lam// rang bzhin byang chub sems kyis brgyan// 'byung ba chen po'i gzugs rtsal can// mi mnyam mnyam nyid sngags kyi rgyun// bstan pa'i dus mtshungs snang
ba'o// nub phyogs bde sgo 'jig rten du// phyogs bzhi snang bas bde gshegs gnas// rgyun 'byung drag drags kyang pa spyad pa'i yul// 'od byed nyi ma 'bras bu'i zhing// pad+ma'i mtshan mchog gnas kun
mdzes// rgyal mtshan brtsegs pa bdud dpung 'joms// dgu mdzes 'khor lo'i 'od kyi phreng// kun 'byung zhi ba snying po'i chos// pad+ma'i rigs mchog 'khor kun kyang// de bzhin byang chub bden pa'i
gnas// ye shes stobs mchog 'jigs pa med// khams gsum khyab par mdzad pa'i tshul// grong khyer mchog tu yang sangs rgyas// snying po gser ldan dpung bzhi dag/ 'bar 'od ldan pa'i phyogs 'dzin

la// myang bar rab tu bdud rtsi can// khams rnams mdzad par rab tu brtson// rgyas par mdzad pa'i tshul ston pa'o// rgyal po sa srungs khro byed sde// gzhi 'byung gnyen po ming 'byed skyes// rab brtson brtul zhugs

'khor lo'i bdag/ theg chen gsang ba'i tshul 'dzin pa'o// sems dpa' chen po ye shes blos// rang bzhin gsal ba'i rgyud 'dzin cing// sprul pa'i snang bas kun khyab par// yun ring snang ba ston par byed//
nub byang grong khyer kun grags brtsegs// lha ming dbang po 'phrul pa'i yul// mdangs chen rab gus rtse mo dang/ gdugs mdzes pad+ma'i phreng ba can// sangs rgyas rab bzhad me tog can// yul

dag sgrol ba'i rgya mtsho'i rlabs// 'od zer snang ba gtsug tor can// byams pa'i seng ge sprin gyi shugs// bde gshegs byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor// rdzu 'phrul grags pa cher ldan pa// rang gi zhing khams
snang mdzad cing// sna tshogs theg pas 'dul ba'i tshul// dgongs pas gzhan brgyud zhing khams mchog/ mang por bkur ba yum chen por// thub pa chen po'i 'od dpal la// sngon gyi bya ba ji lta bar// bde
sbyin bdud rtsi grong mchog dang// dpa' bo rtser gnas rdul zhi bar// dus mtshungs 'gro ba'i ston pa mchog/ stobs mchog gsung bcus 'khor los sgyur// thams cad theg pa chen po yis// byang chub sems

kyis tshim par mdzad// de yi bstan pa yun ring du// skal ldan rnams kyis 'dzin par 'gyur// byang phyogs rnga sgra sgrogs byed pa'i// chos rgyal rab tu zhi ba'i 'phrul// blta sdug rin chen glang po'i ri// ri skyabs

me tog spungs pa'i zhing// las rab rdo rje kun spyod pa// mche ba'i sde bcas phyogs las rgyal// go cha sra ba sdug par byed// theg mchog rgyan chen 'od kyi phreng// las kyi rigs mchog che las byung// bya grub
phrin las kun gyi bdag/ brtson 'grus gzhan gyi sde gnon pa'i// mthun byed rig pa'i dpung tshogs kyang// sangs rgyas kun gyis brjod byed cing// byang chub sems dpa' kun gyis bkur// grong khyer chen po
ji lta bar// dpung bcas theg pas yang dag bgrod// thugs rje dri med smon lam bcas// rgyal po'i khab kyis grong gnas byon// zla gshegs 'od zer lhun pos brgyan// gsal rgyal ka la'i grong mchog
bdag/ yul 'khor bcu drug bcu drug skyong// 'dod pa'i yon tan longs spyod brgyan// dpung tshogs sde bcas rab tu snang// gzhan nas 'joms byed gzhon nu'i sde// dri med sangs rgyas rnam bzhi'i

bdag/ gsang ba'i mdzad pas chos kun skyong// 'khor gyi rnal 'byor dbang phyug kun// sku yi snang bas 'dul 'gyur zhing// shes rab chen pos don mthar phyin// ye shes dri ma med pa'i rgyan// rgyan chen ma
'gags bkod pa nyid// zab mo'i dbyings las gzhan mi dmigs// bstan pa'i chos kyis gzhan skyong zhing// phyi nang rang bzhin rnam par grol// yun ring nges par sbyangs pa yis// blo ldan dag gis gzung
bar byed// byang shar 'od rgyan bkod pa yis// thub dka' 'jigs pa'i phyogs kun las// glog 'od myur ba mang po'i gnas// bsil khang rgya mtsho mi thung mgon// phyogs rnams kun la gzi brjid
can// bkra shis rdzas kyis spras pa ru// dpal gyi nam mkha' snying stobs mchog/ dra ba'i 'od zer sgyu ma'i bdag/ ye shes 'od zer 'dod pa'i bla// glu blangs seng ge'i rtsal 'chang ba// rang byung

ye shes chen po'i sku// chos kun bde ba chen po'i dbyings// longs spyod yongs rdzogs sprul pa'i sku// gnyis med chos kyi dbyings su sbyor// de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs rnams dang// byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' che// zab mo gsang ba'i sngags lam rdzogs// thams cad yongs su dag pa'i 'khor// bden pa gnyis su med pa yis// rdzogs chen byang chub sems kyis brgyan// rang bzhin dngos po'i byin

rlabs kyis// yul dus rig mtha' kun tu ston// chags pa chen po bcom ldan 'das// bya bral rtsol bas mi g.yo ba'i/ snying po'i grong khyer phyag rgya che// kun tu mi 'gyur rang bzhin gnas/ bla na med pa'i theg
pa 'di// gsang don gsang mchog gsang ba'i gnas// 'da' dka' rgyal ba mi shigs pa'i// sku gsung gnyis su med pa'i mchog/ thugs rje sprul pas ston mdzad pa// gzhan snang sangs rgyas gnyis pa'i

tshul// mu tig dpal spras gru mo mdangs// mi 'jigs sgrol ba'i rin chen tshal// skya bsangs gangs ri 'od rgyun 'char// gtsug phud snying po lag myur stobs// sde dpon dpung tshogs bzhi ldan pas// grong khyer
kun tu rgyas par byed// gdul bya'i mos pa ji lta bar// thabs mkhas thugs rjes 'dul bar byed// bla na med pa theg pa'i mchog/ bla na med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin// de dag yun ring gzhan gyi don// bstan

pa'i snying po gnas par 'gyur// steng phyogs spobs pa mtha' yas grags// gsal bar byed pa'i zhing khams su// spyi las khyad par dga' ba'i tshal// 'dren pa chen po sa yi bdag/ skyo skye dga' yang dka' ring du
song ba yis// mi 'jigs gnas kun 'dzin pa 'phel// yul chen chos skyong grong khams su// rin chen rgyan tshogs rnam spras pa// rgyal po grags can mi yi mchog/ skyed dgu'i mgon po lha gnas skyes// gzhan
'joms ded dpon kha lo bsgyur// bkra shis rin chen gnas kun skyong// phyogs gnon 'gro ba kun gyi skyabs// gzi brjid phreng ba rgyal ba'i sde// byang chub sems bskyed brtsegs pa'i dpal// mkha' mdzod

ye shes snying po'i mchog/ bdud dpung 'joms pa'i mthu mnga' ba'i// bya rdzogs phrin las kun gyi sgo// sangs rgyas grangs med gsal mdzad cing// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor skyong ba// rnam par yang dag

gnas las byung// kun tu thams cad 'od 'das pa'i// brtse ba 'di dag ye shes thabs// mkha' snang gzugs kyi gnas la spyod// slar yang rnam 'phrul sangs rgyas nyid// grong khyer chen po gzhan du byung// rin
chen me tog grags pa'i sgra// gzugs chen dka' spyod 'byung ba'i zhing// grags pa mtshan ldan rgyal po'i khab// sa srungs lag na rin chen skyes// dpal gyi phreng ba rgya mtsho'i khrom// de bzhin
btsun mo g.yog 'khor dag/ bde gshegs dkon mchog rgyal mtshan dbyangs// dpal gyi seng ge sgrub byed gnog/ yongs su brgyud kyi sras kun dang// gsang ba'i rgyud mchog ston par byed// spobs pa chen

po mdzes pa'i rgyas// dngos mchog kun tu rnam par spel// rgyal ba mya ngan 'das 'jigs pa'i// tshul dka'i gzhan gyi rgyun gcod pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' grags kun gyis// bstan pa'i snying po rgyas par
bzung// mi bskyod byang chub bde ba'i rgya// chos rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid yin// 'og gi 'khor lo kun spyan gsal// tshul ma ri bo brtsegs pa yis// bum pa'i gzugs byed gdugs khyab pa// rnam spyod mang
po mtha' yas pa'i// brtson 'grus bla ma de 'byung bar// rang gi yul 'khor gnas rnams skyong// bram ze'i rigs kyi phyogs rgyas dag/ chos kyi rgyal po gdan la bzhugs// dus kun dga' ba'i longs spyod

dang// sde dpung ris su 'dzin med par// sA la'i shing chen rgyas pa'i mchog/ rin chen tshogs la longs spyod gnas// rgyal po nam mkha'i blo gros dpal// sa yi dbang po skyabs sbyin mchog/ zas bzang bdud

rtsi bdag po'i bdag/ bdun rgyud kha lo'i las kun spyod// las tshogs 'jug pa'i rgyu yi stobs// thar pa'i gru bo gnas dag pa// rdo rje snang ba thabs chen mchog/ tshul kun myur ba gnon pa nyid// 'di dag
rang gi ngang tshul bzang// thog mtha' phyogs rgyas bden pa'i don// bde gshegs byang chub me tog phreng// sras kyi dam pas 'dud pa'i gnas// zhing khams chen po kun gsal ba// rdzu 'phrul 'jigs med
gtso bo'i tshul// dam chos gnas la legs bzhugs te// 'od zer snang bas thams cad bskul// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor tshogs chen kun// ting 'dzin rab tu zhi bas gnas// byang chub sems dpar 'dus

pa che// mi 'byed rgyud kyi snying po ston// de yi bstan pas kun khyab par// theg chen gsang sngags rgyas par mdzad// sbyin pa chen po mnga' mdzad pa// byang chub yan lag 'brel pa'i gnas// bsod nams ye
